title: [An homelye to be read in the tyme of pestylence]
author: Hooper, John, d. 1555.
publisher: By Ihon Oswen, prynter appointed by the Kinges Maiestie for the principalitie of Wales and marches of the same,
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Heading A2r reads: To all pastoures and curates wythin the Kinges Maiesties diocesse of Worcester and Gloucester.
Imperfect: title page illegible (title from STC).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
